All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Serialized Form

A

addTransaction(double, String) - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
Validates the input data (the amount and category that the user specifies), then creates a new Transaction object if the data is valid.
addTransaction(Transaction) - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
Adds a new transaction to the list of transactions.
AmountFilter - Class in controller
The AmountFilter class implements the TransactionFilter interface and overrides the filter method defined there.
AmountFilter(double) - Constructor for class controller.AmountFilter
The constructor method that initializes the AmountFilter instance with the user-specified amount.
applyFilter(TransactionFilter) - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
Applies the user-specified filter to the list of transactions and updates the view to show the filtered list of transactions.

C

CategoryFilter - Class in controller
The CategoryFilter class implements the TransactionFilter interface and overrides the filter method defined there.
CategoryFilter(String) - Constructor for class controller.CategoryFilter
The constructor method that initializes the CategoryFilter instance with the user-specified category.
controller - package controller
 

E

ExpenseTrackerApp - Class in Unnamed Package
The ExpenseTrackerApp class allows users to add daily transactions.
ExpenseTrackerApp() - Constructor for class ExpenseTrackerApp
 
ExpenseTrackerController - Class in controller
The ExpenseTrackerController class is responsible for managing the interactions between the model and the view.
ExpenseTrackerController(ExpenseTrackerModel, ExpenseTrackerView) - Constructor for class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
The constructor method that initializes the model and view components.
ExpenseTrackerModel - Class in model
The ExpenseTrackerModel class is responsible for managing the transaction data.
ExpenseTrackerModel() - Constructor for class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
Constructor method that creates a new ExpenseTrackerModel instance with an empty ArrayList that will store transactions.
ExpenseTrackerView - Class in view
The ExpenseTrackerView class creates the User Interface for the Expense Tracker application.
ExpenseTrackerView() - Constructor for class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Constructs the main GUI for the Expense Tracker application.

F

filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class controller.AmountFilter
Filters the list of transactions, returning only the Transaction objects in the list that match the amount specified by the user.
filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class controller.CategoryFilter
Filters the list of transactions, returning only the Transaction objects in the list that match the category specified by the user.
filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in interface controller.TransactionFilter
Filters the list of transactions based on the arguments passed into the method.

G

getAddTransactionBtn() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Returns the "Add Transaction" button component.
getAmount() - Method in class model.Transaction
Gets the transaction amount.
getAmountField() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Retrieves the amount entered in the amount field.
getCategory() - Method in class model.Transaction
Gets the transaction category.
getCategoryField() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Retrieves the current text entered in the category input field.
getFilterAmountField() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Retrieves the amount entered in the amount filter field.
getFilterBtn() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Returns the "Apply Filter" button component.
getFilterCategoryField() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Retrieves the category entered in the category filter field.
getTableModel() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Returns the table model used for displaying transaction data in the table.
getTimestamp() - Method in class model.Transaction
Gets the timestamp of when the transaction was created by the user.
getTransactions() - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
Retrieves an immutable copy of the list of transactions.
getTransactionsTable() - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Returns the JTable component that displays the transactions list.

I

InputValidation - Class in controller
Class that handles the validation of the inputs.
InputValidation() - Constructor for class controller.InputValidation
 
isValidAmount(double) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
Validates the amount field.
isValidCategory(String) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
Validates the category field.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ExpenseTrackerApp
Initializes the view for the application, and sets up event handling for "Add Transaction" button clicks.
model - package model
 

R

refresh() - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
Retrieves the latest transactions from the model and uses that list to update the view.
refreshTable(List<Transaction>) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Refreshes the transaction table with the latest list of transactions.
removeTransaction(Transaction) - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
Removes a specified transaction from the list of transactions.

S

setAmountField(JFormattedTextField) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Sets the amount input field in the view.
setCategoryField(JTextField) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
Sets the category input field in the view.

T

Transaction - Class in model
The Transaction class represents a user's transaction.
Transaction(double, String) - Constructor for class model.Transaction
Constructor method for initializing a new Transaction object.
TransactionFilter - Interface in controller
The TransactionFilter interface defines the method signature for filtering transactions.

V

view - package view
